name: G-Force
synopsis: In G-Force we will get into the shoes of little Darwin, the leader of G-Force; as well as that of Mooch, the fly expert in surveillance and espionage. Darwin and Mooch, along with the rest of their G-Force companions, will use their high-tech equipment, their mastery in the art of infiltration, and their teamwork to save the world from the clutches of an ever-evil robotic army.
